Shambhavi Mahamudra - Sydney
Registration confirmation and venue details
Sep 2016
 

Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

We welcome you to the Shambhavi Mahamudra Program. Please see below for your confirmation number for the upcoming Shambhavi Mahamudra Program.

Your Unique Participant ID : {{VAR1}}

Date:
Saturday, 24th September 2016
Sunday, 25th September 2016
Time:
Day 1: Saturday: Check In: 12.00pm - 1:45pm
Door closes at 2:00 pm. Class Ends: 5:00 pm
Day 2: Sunday: Class begins: 7:00 am. Ends: 7:00 pm
Venue:
  • The Great Hall, Sydney Boys High School, 11 Anzac parade, Moore Park, NSW 2021
  • Enter Via Anzac Parade
  • Click here for google map and directions.
  • Ample parking in the venue
  • Sydney Buses operates a large number of bus routes that pass Sydney Boys High School on Anzac Parade or Cleveland Street
Contact:
Email: australia@ishafoundation.org
Phone: 0432 268 672
Empty Stomach Condition / Meal
  • Due to the nature of the program and the practices taught, it is important that you are on an empty stomach by 2pm on Saturday. Please finish your lunch no later than 10am, or light snack no later than 11:30am.
  • A wholesome vegetarian breakfast and lunch will be provided on Sunday.
  • During the program, please do not eat outside the meal timings. Drinking water is fine any time.
  • Please make sure you do not consume any alcohol in the 12 hours before the program starting time at 2pm Saturday.
Things to Bring - General Information
  1. Cushion and/or yoga mat
  2. A pen and small notebook
  3. Wear loose and comfortable clothing for sitting on the floor and for stretching, and a light jacket or sweater in case you feel cold
  4. Sneakers/sports shoes
  5. Please bring this confirmation email printed out, or on your mobile
  6. The importance of food and how it impacts your system is discussed by Sadhguru in one of the treasure trove videos from the "Bonuses" section. Please take the time to view this one-hour video, by clicking on ‘Class 5’ from the pull-down menu and scrolling to the question “ What kind of food should I eat?” Following the video, information presented will provide guidelines on the kind of food that will enhance your health and general well-being
  7. Please make sure you are at the venue at least 30 mins in advance with ample of time to complete the check-in formalities (doors closes at 2.00pm) and we will not be able to disrupt the class once it has started.
  8. Attendance is mandatory on both Saturday and Sunday. If you miss the session on Saturday, you will not be able to attend the session on Sunday.
